Articles.Content:
Hi.

I have a really stupid question, but still didn't find corresponding entry in menu and settings.cfg neither.

Is there any way to change camera rotation (Middle mouse button by default) button?

Honestly...all of my mices MMBs have problem now.. :\

Edited March 21, 2014 by kotysoft
I've got a MMB issue: Whack-a-Kerbal doesn't work...
So... Is it not possible in the current state of game?

I would replace the mouse with one that has a working MMB. Seriously, I can buy a mouse for $2 here.

That said, I play on a laptop with no MMB, so I just use the arrow keys to rotate the camera.

As I experienced rotating is not same as MMB do... Imho it changes the center of view, and it needs this for bigger rockets/stations

And yes. Mouse is cheap, but I like better to play with a good mouse with broken MMB than a poor-quality, unconfortable working one. And a good mouse is not $2

I'm unemployed atm...

You are correct, the mmb moves the camera's focal point.

I've not dug around in the game to see if there's a way to remap (and can't atm). However, if you are using windows you can sometimes remap mouse functions using your mouse driver (usually in the conrol panel). I have a simple logitech gaming mouse and it lets me remap a lot of functions, although it has several spare buttons.

If your mouse utility doesn't do that, you can try Windows' accessibility feature. That will also let you remap some stuff, although I'm uncertain about the mmb.

Sorry, I have no Mac/Linux help.

Good luck.
